title: What BTS record makes you feel the most proud? - Quora

response.answer_text: Right now it's definetly the number one spot on the Billboard hot 100  Mostly we worked so hard all together (Army's all around the world) but also because it was their main goal and they were so excited to be number one one day.  They were even on top of famous americans singer and as a part of a fanbase president in my country seeing all out efforts pay off is the most beautiful thing that could happen 💕 Obviously I was also so happy and proud of the members who always work hard and do their best for us. Hearing how they cried and how happy Jungkook was since it was his birthday was so cute. I hope they will win more awards soon and a Grammy award soon. I really love them and I am proud of everything they achieved. Thank you for reading, stream Dynamite and have a good day 💜
